slider-data.title: Discover Your Signature Scent
slider-data.description: Explore a curated collection of timeless classics and modern masterpieces. Elevate your style with fragrances that speak to your soul.

slider-data.title: Unleash the Power of Scent
slider-data.description: Step into a world of alluring scents and unforgettable moments. The perfect fragrance awaits you.

new-arrivals.title: African Leather
new-arrivals.description: A bold and exotic fragrance inspired by the vast African savannah. Rich leather notes blend with spicy, woody undertones to create an unforgettable scent.

new-arrivals.title: Sauvage Elixir
new-arrivals.description: An intense and refined interpretation of the iconic Sauvage. Spicy, aromatic, and woody, this fragrance embodies raw masculinity with a touch of elegance.

new-arrivals.title: Casamorati Mefisto
new-arrivals.description: A sophisticated, aromatic fragrance with a rich blend of citrus, lavender, and warm woods. Mefisto offers an elegant balance of freshness and depth.
